Description: Trusting Flyrobe was a big mistake. I booked a Raymond suit and got carefree as I thought my dress would be delivered to me before the party. But no, there was no sign of any callback from flyrobe, no person came to me for measurements and no calls from flyrobe on the day of delivery. I kept trying their customer are, no one picked up the call. I had to make last minute arrangements for my party. Next day I get a message from them that the order was cancelled by them unfortunately and they apologized for inconvenience. So simple for them ! They would have atleast called me and told me about this before or on the delivery date. This is a very naive startup and my very first experience with them got really bad. I won't be using this app again.
tag: [' Next day I get a message from them that the order was cancelled by them unfortunately and they apologized for inconvenience', ' This is a very naive startup and my very first experience with them got really bad']

Description: HORRIBLE SERVICE AND FALSELY ACCUSING OF NOT RETURNING THE PRODUCT!!!!!! It has been 17 days since i returned the lehenga. I still haven't received the security money. I have sent so many emails and called so many times. Now after 17 days you're telling me that the dupatta is missing??! I packed everything properly and returned your product in very good condition. I had nothing to do with the missing dupatta! You might want to ask your delivery boy about that! Or maybe this is just what you say so that you don't have to refund the security. I want my security money back! It was even a lot more than the actual rent amount of the lehenga. I will never recommend this app to anyone but suggest people not to use it. Why would you do quality check after 17 days of receiving the product?? Your way of managing things is very very poor. If i could give minus stars, i would! Highly disappointed!!

Description: Worst people to deal with. I had placed my first order bearing order number MMR 065756, with them on 22 april' 2017 for a two pc raymond suit on a rental period for 4 days. I was suppose to receive the suit delivery on 25th april'17. Since nobody turned up till 25th, i called their help line number regarding status of my rented suit, i was given assurance that it will be delivered by 26th evening anyhow. Even on 26th evening, nobody turned up from flyrobe, i called the helpline number but nobody answered the call. Now on 27th april'17, wedding day of my cousin, i again called the helpline number, again i was given assurance of the delivery deadline by 5 pm. Again nobody turned up and they never bothered to call me about the status of my order. I had to attain my cousins wedding in simple formal attire. These people are not fit to do any business, lack ethical responsibility, no follow up of order. Small startup like these cannot ever flourish. I suggest everyone dont get fooled by these peoples.
tag: ['Worst people to deal with', ' Even on 26th evening, nobody turned up from flyrobe, i called the helpline number but nobody answered the call', ' Again nobody turned up and they never bothered to call me about the status of my order']

Description: I gave 4 because of their late messaging system. I received messages regarding something which already happen. Outdated message which will sure be helpful if sent on time. Also very useless online chat option, never gave answer instantly. I asked question yesterday and did not get reply till now. It's waste of time, but I must say customer service over the phone is good. They are helpful and polite. Good job!!!
tag: [' Outdated message which will sure be helpful if sent on time', ' Also very useless online chat option, never gave answer instantly']

Description: I have not seen a more irresponsible company in my life. I gave my wedding lehnga as a part of "make money off your closet" campaign launched by flyrobe and looks like flyrobe is the one making money out of my attire. It's been 3 months and I have been following up with them about the lehnga and the dashboard they promised. Everytime I call I hear a scripted apology note and a promise that they l straighten things out. They know how to make stories but absolutely fall short on taking action. In 3 months there was no follow up emails... You can be lucky if they pick up your call. Would strongly discourage anyone from falling in their trap of the fancy campaigns they run. It's just a way of robbing people and making money off of it.
tag: [" It's just a way of robbing people and making money off of it"]

Description: Diagusting service... "disgusting" is the word.... placed an order 4days ago... measurement was delayed... it was taken 1day just before delivery... despite of regular checks if i was going to get my outfit on the promised date... i didnt get it... infact everyone... from customer service.. floor supervisor.. measurement guy and his manager assured me that i will get it on the promised date... and after my function began... i get a call from flyrobe that they will deliver after 3days now... what for????? customer service is extremely rude... chat would say "how may i help" and when you ask a question.. dey dont reply... please dont order... dey leave u stranded!!! if u do... please keep a back up... pathetic service... no one even follows up... we hav to do that too... flyrobe got me stressed!!!!
tag: [' pathetic service']

Description: I placed an order MPR083620 and delivery date was 25th October which was an important day in my life. It was my best friend reception. Later part of the day I get to know that the order has been cancelled by flyrobe team stating that the order did not pass quality check/not returned by previous owner. As advised by Sachin from customer service team I placed new order#MPR083894 and was assured that it will be delivered by or before 25th october but no surety given. I understood but that it's not going to happen.I called customer service many times, sent them mails to atleast arrange something for me on 25th october but nothing happened. I am without any option now for the day and I feel that I wasted my time over this app. Never ever will I promote this to anyone in my circle. I work for a designated firm and will make sure that my message about flyrobe goes loud and heard. Such unhelpful behavior was least expected. Awful customer service and unprofessional behavior.
tag: [' Such unhelpful behavior was least expected', ' Awful customer service and unprofessional behavior']
